message: that feels really weird, because it's a private group, and it's disconcerting to see someone you don't know show up as appearing to be there
if a non-member of a private group visits the group info page for that group, they will show up in members online now
this is a permutation of the existing bug that non-members of public groups show up in members online now, but it feels more serious since it's degrades the feeling of group of privacy
